'Charles F. Dolan' (born October 16, 1926) is an American billionaire (worth an
estimated $3.3 billion [http://www.forbes.com/profile/charles-dolan Charles
Dolan profile page] Forbes.com. Retrieved April 2011. ) and founder of
Cablevision and HBO. Cablevision Website
http://www.cablevision.com/about/leadership/charles_dolan.jsp Forbes.com http://www.forbes.com/lists/2009/10/billionaires-2009-richest-people_Charles-
Dolan-family_XPDU.html Through supervoting shares, Dolan today controls
Cablevision, AMC Networks, and Madison Square Garden, Inc., which at one point
were all part of Cablevision itself.
